title: ECPower
description: [Manage Segments in One Place] Segments are dynamic and default segmentation fails to monitor it. Track daily metrics like LTV and revenue per segment. [Visualize Customer Journey] Transform your envisioned 'Journey Map' of CRM into digital reality. Discover better path to nurture profitable customers. [Gain Customer Insights Easily] Explore analytic reports on repeat %, CLV, Purchase cycle, AOV and sales. Implement modern retention marketing with automated customer tag integration.
